attributes.title: 💖✨💕if I could rate 0 stars I would💕✨💖
attributes.review: this app is complete trash. It worked fine for a while but ever since the new update it keeps crashing my phone & it freezes. Complete garbage & totally not worth the download so don’t even waste your time. I should have looked at the reviews before I even downloaded it the first time 🥺 for anyone reading this don’t download. I think I’ll stick to the news even tho anything Trump has to say is either racist or irrelevant💖✨💕 . Thank you for your time & have a nice day !

attributes.title: Ew.
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I was met with the most disturbing images of a nude cheeto puff oops I meant our child of a president. Personally the only reason that I downloaded this app was to show that oompa loopa that we need justice and equality for all minorities in this country and maybe just maybe we will all be lucky enough that, that orange peel will understand with his micro brain self that he can just leave and our true leader and role model Michel Obama will talk his place. But I do fear that she will have to deep clean the oval office because there will be a layer of McDonald’s greece built up.

attributes.title: Glitches a lot
attributes.review: It’s always glitching and the subscription to this seems like a scam or threat. I do not recommend wasting your time on this.

attributes.title: Confusing
attributes.review: I got this app and it had a button that said do not press and I pressed it and my screen was flashing and said missile launch activated now I don’t have a house or a neighborhood

attributes.title: daddy chetto✨😌🧚
attributes.review: i am very disappointed in this app😡 i downloaded it to see what our wonderful✨ bunker boy president was planning on doing to make america🇺🇸 great again. but to my surprise this app is not run by buncker boy, it is actually run by some disturbingly ugly 👿 man who is combined with a cheeto and an orange 🍊 i had no idea that there was such a horrific cheeto orange person in this world🌎 once i got into this app, a screen with cheeto orange boy popped up. he told to me call him daddy🥴. he said that was the only respectful thing to call him😌. so please make sure that u call him by his true name. daddy cheeto✨😌🧚 after this occurrence i went to go microwave my cat🐱 as i usually do. and then i noticed that all of these cheetos were showing up in my kitchen😡 they all started to attack me while chanting “daddy cheeto”✨and after all of this i heard a knock at my door. i opened it and it was daddy cheeto himself🥰 i am now in intense therapy due to daddy cheeto. so please. if you don’t want to be attacked by cheetos. then do NOT download this app🧚✨😌

attributes.title: Very bad app after all
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what Donald Trump is planning for his 2020 election and it’s not functioning it made my battery drop like 20% and I’m not happy about it.

attributes.title: tiktok
attributes.review: you delete tiktok we delete ur app

attributes.title: APP is Amazing.
attributes.review: This app works well and is very user friendly. The navigation tools at the bottom are easy to understand and clearly defined. The app incorporates many security measures and verification techniques to ensure privacy. There are many on here deliberately attempting to sabotage the president or silence his voter base by rating the app poorly. However, the app works perfectly. Download and see for yourself.
